publ: by SmartLy Fabricação de Dispositivos Inteligentes
name: Hotfloor-SmartLy(Heating)
0:
”Alexa, set Gourmet thermostat to twenty.”
”Alexa, What is the temperature of Gourmet thermostat?”
”Alexa, turn off Gourmet thermostat.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Control your SmartLy devices through Alexa. It is necessary to link the account using the username and password registered in the Hotfloor - Calefação Ambiente app. If you don't have an account yet, download the Hotfloor app and create an account.
